creator: vincent_koldenhof@hp.com
text:
When you start tomcat using the startup script in the bin folder there are a 
couple of messages generated. They state that tomcat is starting but never when 
it has finished starting and is started. It would be nice to get a message when 
the starting is over and the tomcat is started.

creator: kvenukumar_16@yahoo.com
text:
Created attachment 16937
staring tomcat gives indication that tomcat is starting but never that it is started 8009 port

Linux  2.4.21-4.EL #1 Fri Oct 3 18:13:58 EDT 2003 i686 i686 i386 GNU/Linux
This is my Operating System details.
									       
					     
I configured tomcat+apache using mod_jk.so protocal ajp13,
									       
					     
tomcat and apache working fine, But whenever restarting tomcat(stop and sart),
tomcat port 8080 is listening, But
8009 port listening very slow, Its taking time for listening around 20 minutes,
Please help me.
									       
					     
apache version httpd-2.0.53
tomcat 4.1.27
tomcat connector jakarta-tomcat-connectors-4.1.27-src
Reset assignee to mails go to list.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: This has been fixed for quite some time now.
creator: markt@apache.org
